Uses of Package
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise

Packages that use com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise
Package
Description
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.generators
Contains classes to generate measurements required for the calibration of accelerometers, gyroscopes and magnetometers after detecting static and dynamic intervals.
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.intervals
Contains classes to find static (body of device remains static) or dynamic intervals (some movement or force is applied to body of device) for accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer sensors.
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise
Contains classes related to noise level estimation.
  • Classes in com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise used by com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.generators
    Class
    Description
    AccumulatedAngularSpeedTriadNoiseEstimator
    Estimates accumulated angular speed noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with their average values.
    AccumulatedMagneticFluxDensityTriadNoiseEstimator
    Estimates accumulated magnetometer noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with their average values.
  • Classes in com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise used by com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.intervals
    Class
    Description
    AccumulatedTriadNoiseEstimator
    Base class to estimate measurement noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with their average values.
    WindowedTriadNoiseEstimator
    Base class to estimate measurement noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with average values for a windowed amount of samples.
